label: Create an Image with Dall-E
name: createImageDallE
description: This flow step will create an image with dall-e package.

inputs.label: Prompt
inputs.name: prompt
inputs.description: A text description of the desired image(s). The maximum length is 1000 characters.

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

fields.label: Get url
fields.name: url
fields.description: If true the answer will be a url to the image(s), else you will get a b64 json.

fields.label: N
fields.name: n
fields.description: How many completions to generate for each prompt.

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

fields.label: User
fields.name: user
fields.description: A unique identifier representing your end-user.

fields.label: Connection timeout
fields.name: connectionTimeout
fields.description: Connect timeout interval, in milliseconds (0 = infinity). Default value: 5000 ms (5 sec)

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.

fields.label: Read timeout
fields.name: readTimeout
fields.description: Read timeout interval, in milliseconds (0 = infinity). Default value: 60000 ms (60 sec)

validation.message: The time must be a valid placeholder or a positive integer greater than or equal to 0.
